title: Simplilearn Introduces Apache Kafka and MongoDB Certification Courses for Big Data Professionals
text:
Thursday, August 27, 2015 4:30PM IST (11:00AM GMT) Simplilearn Introduces Apache Kafka and MongoDB Certification Courses for Big Data Professionals Bangalore, Karnataka, India 
Simplilearn , the largest professional certi­fication training provider, introduces new courses under it’s big data and analytics category with Apache Kafka and MongoDB , which are aimed at providing technological and administrative edge for big data professionals. The exploding field of big data has leading Fortune 500 companies investing heavily in the category and the job scope for skilled professionals to capture and understand the data sets is increasing. Providing a range of big data and analytics courses, Simplilearn’s training in Apache Kafka and MongoDB further enhances the course catalogue, creating opportunities for I.T professionals to carve their career paths as Senior Software Professional, IT Consultants, Lead Software Professionals, Database administrators and Big Data professionals. About the courses Apache Kafka Apache Kafka, a high-performance and real-time messaging system for processing millions of messages per second, is amongst the top ten fastest growing, in-demand technical skills. The certification course from Simplilearn is designed to meet this demand and upgrade the skills of professionals in this technology. Professionals can learn the Kafka architecture, installation, interfaces and configuration and get trained in the fundamental concepts of big data. MongoDB MongoDB, a second-generation NoSQL database is popular for its dynamic schema design which allows quick introduction of new data types, limitless addition of new fields, location based data storage, and growth of data. Simplilearn’s certification training in MongoDB Administrator and MongoDB Developer is designed to take learners through the administrative features, functionalities, schema less design features of MongoDB. There is a great demand for skilled professionals in NoSQL databases for the developer and operations roles in the fast-growing big data industry. Learners will benefit from 14 hours of high quality e-learning content, chapter quizzes, lab exercises, simulation exams and course completion certificates. Big data and analytic courses are available through Simplilearn’s online learning model. About Simplilearn: Simplilearn is the world’s largest provider of short term certification courses that addresses unique learning needs of working professionals. Courses include a variety of topics in the business, technology and design domains, ranging from PMP to Big Data Development and Digital Marketing. With over 250 courses on offer from Simplilearn, the platform has trained over 400,000 professionals since its inception in April 2010. With its footprint in over 150 countries, Simplilearn’s patrons are assured of up-skilling and re-skilling themselves for a faster and surer career growth. Simplilearn’s course contents are recognized by over 40 certification bodies, prominent ones being PMI, Axelos, Scrum Alliance, Peoplecert, and The Open Group.
